shows.title: Breaking Bad
shows.description: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's future.

shows.title: Parks and Recreation
shows.description: The absurd antics of an Indiana town's public officials as they pursue sundry projects to make their city a better place.

shows.title: Stranger Things
shows.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying supernatural forces in order to get him back.
